title: 'CoCoMelon' Owner Moonbug Weighs Sale, IPO; Company is seeking a valuation of $3 billion
text:
The company has received interest from multiple suitors and is seeking a valuation of more than $3 billion, some of the people said. One suitor is a company backed by private-equity giant Blackstone Inc. run by former Walt Disney Co. executives Kevin Mayer and Tom Staggs, the people said.

There is no guarantee that the conversations with potential acquirers will result in a deal, the people said. Moonbug is also weighing an initial public offering, which executives believe would result in a valuation significantly higher than $3 billion, some of the people said.

Write to Benjamin Mullin at Benjamin.Mullin@wsj.com, Lillian Rizzo at Lillian.Rizzo@wsj.com and Miriam Gottfried at Miriam.Gottfried@wsj.com

'CoCoMelon' Owner Moonbug Weighs Sale, IPO
